name: Hl7VSProcessInterruption
title: hl7VS-processInterruption
description: Value Set of codes specifying whether a process was interrrupted and whether a needle had been inserted in the donor's arm prior to the interruption.
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

contains.display: Walk Out: Process interrupted before the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm
Aborted Run: Process interrupted after the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm
